name: DelonCoin
description: DelonCoin (DLN) is a decentralized ERC20 token deployed on the Ethereum Mainnet, inspired by the timeless legacy of French cinema icon Alain Delon. Created by his youngest son, Alain-Fabien Delon, DelonCoin champions heritage, independence, and artistic excellence. DelonCoin is closely linked to Alain Delon Film Productions, an independent production company committed to creating and supporting bold, visionary films that carry the spirit of European cinema into the digital age. With a fixed supply of one billion tokens, DLN is intended for use in film financing, digital collectibles, exclusive content, and entertainment-related innovations through blockchain technology. It invites cinephiles, creators, and collectors to take part in a legacy that spans generations—on-chain and on-screen.
